author: abcoathup
content:
This discord is for Ethereum R&D.  It isn't the place to look for app layer work.

There is currently an open role for an ERC & Standards Coordinator: https://jobs.lever.co/ethereumfoundation/4ebdad29-6cea-4a03-804f-4a65b34b5ef6

Ethereum Protocol Fellowship has regular cohorts: https://epf.wiki/#/
